name: norfolk
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= area with its own local government) in eastern England: He had a house in Norfolk. the Norfolk Broads, one of the most important wetlands in Europe
More examplesFewer examplesThese rare birds can be observed sometimes in the wetlands of Norfolk and Cambridgeshire.Simon Newnes, a specialist fish wholesaler in Billingsgate Market in London, buys his shellfish direct from Norfolk. The restaurant is on the north Norfolk coast, two miles from Blakeney.
